title: This Service Collects A Lot Of Personal Data

tosdr.tldr: Linkedin collects the following: name, email address, job title, education, skills, address book and other services that sync with linkedIn, customer service info, when you visit their services, use their mobile applications, interact with advertising on and off their services, ip addresses, user agents, ISP information, etc. In the future, they can create new ways to collect information.
